mapper.sql: id, pid, login_account, status, password, proxy_name, coin_pssword, tell, email, qq, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, rebate_ratio, coin, reg_ip, reg_time, del_status, created_user, updata_user, create_time, updata_time,last_login_ip, last_login_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from proxy_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into proxy_info (id, pid, login_account, status, password, proxy_name, coin_pssword, tell, email, qq, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, rebate_ratio, coin, reg_ip, reg_time, del_status, created_user, updata_user, create_time, updata_time,last_login_ip, last_login_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proxyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coinPssword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rebateRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updataUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update proxy_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_account = #{record.loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update proxy_info
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_account = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proxy_name = #{proxyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coin_pssword = #{coinPssword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tell = #{tell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_address = #{bankAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rebate_ratio = #{rebateRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coin = #{coin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reg_ip = #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updata_user = #{updataUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updata_time = #{updataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update proxy_info set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_account = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proxy_name = #{proxyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coin_pssword = #{coinPssword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tell = #{tell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_address = #{bankAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rebate_ratio = #{rebateRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coin = #{coin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reg_ip = #{regIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, proxy_level = #{proxyLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updata_user = #{updataUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updata_time = #{updataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update proxy_info
password= #{password,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coin_pssword = #{coinPssword,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
updata_user = #{updataUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where login_account = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM proxy_info AS p WHERE 1=1
and p.login_account=#{loginAccount}

SELECT u.UID, u.`NAME` AS fullName, u.USER_NAME AS username, u.AGENT_COUNT AS proxyName, u.COIN, u.AGENT_COIN as agentCoin, u.REG_TIME AS regTime, u.`status`, u.REBATE_DATA AS rebateData FROM user_info u WHERE u.USERTYPE = 1
AND u.USER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keywordValue}),'%')
AND u.AGENT_COUNT like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keywordValue}),'%')
AND u.`NAME` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keywordValue}),'%')
AND AGENT_ID = #{proxyId}
AND u.UID=(SELECT AGENT_ID FROM user_info WHERE UID=#{proxyId})
select pin.id as pid, pin.login_account AS parentName from proxy_info pin
mapper.update:
update proxy_info
status =0,
updata_user = #{updataUser},
updata_time = #{updataTime},
where id = #{id}

update proxy_info
status = #{status},
updata_user = #{updataUser},
updata_time = #{updataTime},
where id = #{id} and id not in (1)
mapper.select: SELECT uf.`UID` as uid, uf.`AGENT_ID` as agentId, pf.rebate_ratio as rebateRatio, SUM(IF(cg.`coin_operate_type`='3',cg.coin,0.00)) AS userBettingAmount, SUM(IF(cg.`coin_operate_type`='9',cg.coin,0.00)) AS userCaseOutAmount FROM ls.user_info uf LEFT JOIN ls.coin_log cg ON uf.`UID`=cg.`uid` LEFT JOIN ls.proxy_info pf on pf.id = uf.`AGENT_ID` WHERE 1=1 and cg.inputTime >=#{startDate} and cg.inputTime <=#{endDate} and uf.`UID` not in (select distinct pd.uid from proxy_distribution pd where pd.startDate=#{startDate} and pd.endDate=#{endDate}) GROUP BY uf.`UID`

SELECT pf.id, pf.`rebate_ratio` as rebateRatio, pf.pid, (select IFNULL(cast(yf.rebate_ratio as char),'') from proxy_info yf where yf.id = pf.pid) as prebateRatio, pf.coin as userCoin FROM proxy_info pf WHERE pf.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update proxy_info pf set pf.coin=pf.coin+#{coin} where pf.id=#{id}
UPDATE proxy_info p set p.coin = (p.coin - #{rebatesAmount}) WHERE id = #{agentId}
mapper.select: SELECT pi.coin, pi.id ,login_account userName FROM proxy_info pi WHERE pi.id=#{id}
SELECT reg_time as regTime, rebate_ratio as rebateRatio, id , login_account as userName FROM proxy_info WHERE login_account=#{userName}

select.if: select u.AGENT_ID from user_info u where u.UID = #{uid} and u.STATUS<>3
